description: This header file declares utility functions related to MTLS (Mutual TLS) management and system telemetry. It includes function prototypes for initializing, uninitializing MTLS, retrieving MTLS certificates, and getting system uptime. It also includes necessary headers and macro definitions.

methods.name: initMtls
methods.description: Initializes MTLS (Mutual TLS) resources or context.

methods.name: uninitMtls
methods.description: Uninitializes or cleans up MTLS resources.

methods.name: getMtlsCerts
methods.description: Retrieves the current MTLS certificate name and passphrase.

methods.name: get_system_uptime
methods.description: Returns the system uptime as a double.
